mapper.sql: reim_id, reim_staffid, reim_matter, reim_starttime, reim_endtime, reim_place, reim_traffic, reim_stay, reim_referr
mapper.select: select *from (select * from oas_reimburse left join oas_staff on reim_staffid=staff_id) a left join oas_department on a.staff_depID=dep_id
mapper.insert: insert into oas_reimburse (reim_id, reim_staffid, reim_matter, reim_starttime, reim_endtime, reim_place, reim_traffic, reim_stay, reim_referr) values (#{reimId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reimStaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reimMatter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reimStarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reimEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reimPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reimTraffic,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reimStay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reimReferr,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into oas_reimburse
reim_id,
reim_staffid,
reim_matter,
reim_starttime,
reim_endtime,
reim_place,
reim_traffic,
reim_stay,
reim_referr,

mapper.update:
update oas_reimburse
reim_staffid = #{reimStaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reim_matter = #{reimMatter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reim_starttime = #{reimStarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
reim_endtime = #{reimEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
reim_place = #{reimPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reim_traffic = #{reimTraffic,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
reim_stay = #{reimStay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
reim_referr = #{reimReferr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where reim_id = #{reimId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update oas_reimburse set reim_staffid = #{reimStaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, -- reim_depid = #{reimDepid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reim_matter = #{reimMatter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reim_starttime = #{reimStarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reim_endtime = #{reimEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reim_place = #{reimPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reim_traffic = #{reimTraffic,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, reim_stay = #{reimStay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, reim_referr = #{reimReferr,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where reim_id = #{reimId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
